name: geb-subgraph
description: The Graph protocol subgraph for GEB

scripts.deploy-local: npm run prepare-${NETWORK:-mainnet} && npm run codegen && npm run create; graph deploy --node ${GRAPH_ADMIN_RPC_URL} --ipfs ${IPFS_URL} ${SUBGRAPH_NAME} --version-label v1;
scripts.deploy-hosted-alchemy-optimism-goerli: npm run prepare-optimism-goerli && npm run codegen; graph deploy hai --version-label v1 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key deployKeyHere
scripts.deploy-hosted-alchemy-optimism-sepolia: npm run prepare-optimism-sepolia && npm run codegen; graph deploy hai --version-label v1 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key deployKeyHere
scripts.deploy-hosted-mainnet: npm run prepare-mainnet && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-mainnet
scripts.deploy-hosted-dev: npm run prepare-mainnet && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guifel/geb
scripts.prepare-mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-optimism-goerli: mustache config/optimism-goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/optimism-goerli.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-optimism-sepolia: mustache config/optimism-sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/optimism-sepolia.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts

author: Guillaume Felley
